Zusammenfassung: As a user I want to have any grinding process been stopped after a max. timeout of 90secs
As a user I want to start / stop grinding actions from the HMI
As a user I want to be informed about errors
As a user I want to service the grinder without being hurt when the motor starts
As a user I want to edit and save persistently up to 4 recipes
As a user I want to execute grinding from a predefined recipe
As a user I want to execute manual grinding
As a user I want to instantly wake-up my grinder from energy saving mode upon any user action on the HMI
As a user I want to save energy when the grinder is not in use
As a user I want to have a health monitoring function which permanently observes my grinder to enable a high availability
As a user I want to start / stop grinding actions by applying the porta filter to the grinder
As a user I want to update the firmware of my grinder via the WiFi interface
As a user I want to reset the WiFi configuration of the grinder
As a user I want to enable / disable the WiFi connection of the grinder
As a producer I want to identify the grinder product
As a user I want to stay in error display upon fatal errors
As a user I want to force the grinder going into sleep mode by using the HMI
As a user I want to use the latest grind mode after switching on the grinder which was active before switching off
As a user I want to let a temporary menu automatically jump back to the last used grinding menu after 3secs
As a user I want to continue a grinding process by a manual start/stop operation within 10sec after stopping the last grinding process
As a user I want to be visually informed about the grinder being in standby mode
As a user I want to use grinding capabililty as far as possible beside any existing system errors
As a user I want to use the latest grind mode after waking up from standby which was active before going into standby
As a user I want to have statistic data persistently logged on my grinder
As a user I want to have relevant error events persistently logged on my grinder
As a user I want to have relevant events persistently logged on my grinder
As a user I want to configure the time until my grinder goes into energy saving mode
As a user I want to connect or disconnect a scale to my grinder
As a user I want to prevent other users within my local network from accessing my grinder via WiFi
As a user I want to use a correct timestamp when data is being logged on my grinder
